fields.description: Use this property for StorageAccountConnectionString. Set the name of the app setting that has the storage account connection string. Do not set a value for this property when using other authentication type.
fields.name: StorageAccountConnectionStringName

fields.description: Property to select authentication type to access the selected storage account. Available options: SystemAssignedIdentity, UserAssignedIdentity, StorageAccountConnectionString.
fields.name: Type

fields.description: Use this property for UserAssignedIdentity. Set the resource ID of the identity. Do not set a value for this property when using other authentication type.
fields.name: UserAssignedIdentityResourceId
